bibl.title: New Literary and Sub-Literary Fragments from the Fayum.
bibl.note: From the residue from Grenfell and Hunt's excavations in the Fayum. - 1. Euripides, Cresphontes. Late Irst or early IInd century A.D. - 2. Prose Fragment. Late IInd or early IIIrd century A.D. - 3. Medical Fragment (?). Late IIIrd or early IInd B.C. - 4. Prose Fragment. Late IIIrd or early IInd century B.C. - 5. Callimachus, In Dianam. IInd century A.D. - 6. Isocrates, Panegyricus. Late IInd or early IIIrd century A.D. - 7. Prophecy (?). IInd century A.D. - 8. Medical Prescriptions. Early IInd century A.D. (?). - 10. Speech (?). Late IInd century A.D. (?). - 11-13. Minor Unidentified Literary Fragments. - 14-20. Homer. Fragments.
Coles Revel A., New Literary and Sub-Literary Fragments from the Fayum.
ZPE 6 (1970) pp. 247-266 et pll. X a-b; - XII a.
141.4 364 Callimachus Euripides Homerus Isocrates Medicorum Scripta Oracula Prosa varia Tachygraphica
